title: (x) Curb Your Enthusiasm logo - Univers {Anastas}
content:
Anyone know what this is? I’ve had a surprisingly difficult time with it though it looks pretty “standard.” It kind of reminds me of interstate black but that didn’t match up. Maybe I’m tired. Nonetheless, any help appreciated as always.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [enthus.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080503184805/http:/typophile.com/files/enthus.jpg) | 67.95 KB |

 [‹ Emerson logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20080503184805/http:/www.typophile.com/node/12776 "Go to previous forum topic") [SpongeBob SquarePants movie poster titling font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080503184805/http:/www.typophile.com/node/12758 "Go to next forum topic")
author: James Gareth

comments.content: Ugh, that would be Univers 85 Black, Horizontally scaled, with default Illustrator leading. Yum.
Many thanks guys. I don’t know why they scaled it, the original type looks so much better. Thanks again.
